title: Government Unveils Comprehensive Relief Package for Citizens
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 2 (APP):In a bid to alleviate the financial burden on its citizens, the government has announced a wide-ranging relief package, providing subsidies on essential services and commodities. This move is expected to bring respite to millions of households across the country.
According to Barrister Aqeel Malik, Spokesperson on Legal Affairs, the government has provided all possible relief to people on power and petroleum products, following the directives of Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif. The government is well aware of the problems faced by the low-salary group and has taken concrete steps to address their concerns.
On the special instruction of the Prime Minister, a handsome amount has been released to extend relief to power consumers. Additionally, prices of petroleum products have been reduced to lower the burden on the general public.
In a significant move, the government has also announced a heavy package for the families of missing persons to help them run their home affairs in a proper manner. This gesture demonstrates the government’s commitment to supporting its citizens during challenging times.
This comprehensive relief package is a testament to the government’s dedication to promoting economic welfare and improving the overall quality of life for its people.
